## ğŸ­ Animation Showcase

### Entrance Sequences

**Welcome Screen:**

```
0ms    â†’ Logo scales + rotates
0ms    â†’ Title fades + slides
300ms  â†’ Features fade + slide
600ms  â†’ CTA fades + slides
âˆ      â†’ Logo floats continuously
```

**Login Screen:**

```
0ms    â†’ Header fades + slides from top
200ms  â†’ Form fades + slides from bottom
```

**Comments:**

```
0ms    â†’ Scale from 0 to 1
0ms    â†’ Fade from 0 to 1
```

### Press Interactions

**Buttons:**

```
Press   â†’ Scale 0.96 + Opacity 0.8
Release â†’ Scale 1.0 + Opacity 1.0
Loading â†’ Opacity 0.6
```

**FAB:**

```
Press   â†’ Scale 0.9 (100ms)
Release â†’ Scale 1.0 (100ms)
Always  â†’ Shadow level 5
```

**Inputs:**

```
Focus   â†’ Border 1px â†’ 2px (spring)
Focus   â†’ Color gray â†’ primary (timing)
Focus   â†’ Icon scale 1 â†’ 1.1 (spring)
Blur    â†’ Reverse all
```

## âœ¨ Signature Features

